Class ObjectToXmlConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.core.Component

          org.openadaptor.thirdparty.xstream.ObjectToXmlConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Administrable, IComponent, IDataProcessor
public class ObjectToXmlConverter
extends XStreamConverter
implements IDataProcessor

Converts the incoming object into an Xml string using XStream. See Base class for details of how to configure XStream.

perryj

Method Detail

process

public java.lang.Object[] process(java.lang.Object data)
Description copied from interface: IDataProcessor
Processes some data and return the results. Results must be in an array. Valid return values include null and empty arrays which indicate that the data is to be discarded. It is assumed that implementations will cast the incoming data to an expected type(s). Exceptions should be thrown as RuntimeException. If the implementation is an IComponent then this should be a subclass of OAException. Generally this will be a ProcessingException as the most likey problems are going to be with processing message data.

Specified by:
process in interface IDataProcessor
Returns:
output, zero length array or null indicates that data was discarded
